short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open New Tab to Explore the World
short.zh_CN: 打开新标签页以探索世界

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dream Afar New Tab
The prestigious tourist attractions are displayed on the new tab page, and the following features are also provided:


✔️ Multiple wallpaper source switching, including Dream Afar, Google Earth, Google Art, Bing, 500px, Flickr, Unsplash. Some of them require you to grant access when you use them.

✔️ You can choose your own wallpaper category, including nature, ocean, architecture, animals, travel, food, comic, sports, technology and street.

✔️ You can set the wallpaper switching method to random or loop, and you can set the interval time for wallpaper switching.

✔️ You can click the icon on the left of the setting to switch the wallpaper.

✔️ Weather widget, search bar widget, and most frequently visited website widgets are provided.

✔️ Each widget can be set display mode: show, hover, or hide.

✔️ Each widget can be set opacity.

✔️ Bookmarks, historical access records and web store are provided.

✔️ Provides two search engines: Baidu and Bing.

✔️ The unit of temperature can be set.

✔️ Hover the mouse over the weather icon to display the temperature, wind force, pressure, humidity, sunrise and sunset time of the day, and view the temperature in the next five days.
long.zh_CN:
远方新标签页Dream Afar New Tab
在新标签页上展示久负盛名的观光胜地，同时提供了以下功能：


✔️ 多个壁纸来源切换，包括Dream Afar、Google Earth、Google Art、Bing、500px、Flickr、Unsplash。其中某些在您使用的时候需要您授予访问权限。

✔️ 您可以自主选择喜爱的壁纸类别，包括自然、海洋、建筑、动物、旅行、美食、动漫、运动、技术和街头。

✔️ 您可以设置壁纸的切换方式为随机或循环，您可以设置壁纸切换的间隔时间。

✔️ 点击右下角的小风车即可快速切换壁纸。

✔️ 提供了天气小组件、搜索栏小组件、最常访问网站小组件。

✔️ 每个小组件都可以设置显示方式为：显示、悬停、或隐藏。

✔️ 每个小组件都可以设置透明度。

✔️ 支持访问书签、历史访问记录和应用商店。

✔️ 提供了百度和必应两种搜索引擎。

✔️ 可以设置气温的单位。

✔️ 将鼠标悬停在天气小组件上，可以显示当天的气温、风力、压强、湿度和日出日落时间，同时可以查看未来五天的气温。
